snippet.title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice - Gamescom 2018 Gameplay Video
snippet.description: Your death won’t come easily. Enter the world of late 1500s Sengoku Japan; a brutal, bloody period of constant life-and-death conflict. As tensions rise, a compelling new story unfolds amongst the chaos. Introducing Sekiro™: Shadows Die Twice, a dark and twisted new gameplay experience developed by the renowned team at FromSoftware and published by Activision. Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice is due to be released on March 22, 2019.
